description:
A grid-based movement controller that can allow you to create:
- A sokoban, or box pusher game.
- An RPG game.
- Any grid based game.
It includes:
- A condition to check if the object is done moving.
- A condition to check if a control was stimulated.

Modify your values according to your needs.
name: GridBasedMovement
shortDescription: A simple grid based movement to move sprites on a grid.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Adding this to the user's sprite object to make it able to move in a grid.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: GridMovement

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the object is not moving.
eventsFunctions.name: IsNotMoving

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a control is being stimulated.
eventsFunctions.name: IsControlBeingSimulated

eventsFunctions.description: Stops the object with option of snapping it back in place, only works if the object is still moving.
eventsFunctions.name: StopMoving
